member.summary: Hazelcast-specific cache service implementation

member.name: T:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration options for HTTP client resilience patterns

member.name: F:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration.SectionName
member.summary: Configuration section name

member.name: P:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration.MaxRetries
member.summary: Maximum number of retry attempts Default: 3

member.name: P:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration.RetryDelayMs
member.summary: Base delay in milliseconds for exponential backoff Default: 1000ms (1 second)

member.name: P:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration.CircuitBreakerThreshold
member.summary: Number of consecutive failures before circuit breaker opens Default: 3

member.name: P:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration.CircuitBreakerDurationSeconds
member.summary: Duration in seconds that circuit breaker stays open Default: 30 seconds

member.name: P:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration.TimeoutSeconds
member.summary: HTTP client timeout in seconds Default: 30 seconds

member.name: P:Shared.Services.HttpClientConfiguration.EnableDetailedMetrics
member.summary: Whether to include detailed timing metrics in logs Default: true

member.name: T:Shared.Services.HttpClientServiceExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for configuring HTTP clients with standardized resilience patterns

member.summary: Adds a standardized HTTP client with correlation ID support Note: Resilience patterns are handled by the BaseManagerHttpClient implementation
member.param: Optional client name (defaults to type name)
member.returns: The service collection for method chaining

member.name: M:Shared.Services.HttpClientServiceExtensions.AddHttpClientCorrelationSupport(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds correlation ID support to HTTP clients
member.returns: The service collection for method chaining
